original_text: And they judged the people at all times. Any hard case they brought to Moses, but any small matter they decided themselves.
korean_text: 그들이 때를 따라 백성을 재판하되 어려운 일은 모세에게 가져오고 모든 작은 일은 스스로 재판하더라

sentences.original_text: And they judged the people at all times.
Any hard case they brought to Moses,
but any small matter they decided themselves.
